metadata.titleEn: Multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements observation dataset in the Hai River Basin (Huailai station-automatic weather station-10m tower, 2015)
metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：怀来站-自动气象站（10m塔）-2015
metadata.description:
The data set contains the observation data of the 10m tower automatic meteorological station on December 31, 2015 on January 1, 2015 at solstice.The station is located in east garden town, huailai county, hebei province.The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 115.7880E, 40.3491N, and the altitude is 480m.
The automatic weather station is installed on a 10m tower, the acquisition frequency is 30s, and the output time is 10min.The observation factors include air temperature and relative humidity (5m), and the direction is due north.The wind speed (10m), the wind direction (10m), the direction is due to the north;Air pressure (installed in waterproof box);Rainfall (10m);The four-component radiation (5m), the direction is due to the south;The infrared surface temperature (5m), the arm is facing south, and the probe is facing vertically downward.The soil temperature and humidity probe was buried at 1.5m to the south of the meteorological tower. The buried depth of the soil temperature probe was 0cm, 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 80cm, 120cm and 160cm. The buried depth of the soil moisture sensor was 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 10cm, 10cm, 10cm, 20cm, 80cm, 120cm and 160cm.The average soil temperature was buried 2,4 cm underground.Soil hot flow plates (3) are buried in the ground 6cm.
Processing and quality control of observation data :(1) ensure 144 data per day (every 10min). If data is missing, it will be marked by -6999;(2) eliminate the moments with duplicate records;(3) data that is obviously beyond the physical meaning or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the format of date and time is unified, and the date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: 10:30 on June 10, 2015.Data missing due to damage of charging controller from May 30 to June 5 and October 1 to October 9.Soil heat flux G1 due to the heat flux plate problem, the data of April 19 solstice on May 20 was missing.
Data released by the automatic weather station include:Date/Time, air temperature and humidity observation (Ta_5m, RH_5m) (℃, %), wind speed (Ws_10m) (m/s), wind direction (WD) (°), pressure (hpa), precipitation (Rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, UR, DLR, ULR, Rn) (W/m2), surface radiation temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (℃),Soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, Gs_3) (W/m2), multi-layer soil moisture (Ms_2cm, Ms_4cm, Ms_10cm, Ms_20cm, Ms_40cm, Ms_80cm, Ms_120cm, Ms_160cm) (%), multi-layer soil temperature (Ts_2cm, Ts_4cm, Ts_10cm, Ts_20cm, Ts_40cm, Ts_80cm, Ts_120cm, Ts_160cm) (℃), average soil temperature TCAV (℃).
Please refer to Guo et al. (2020) for information of observation test or site, and Liu et al. (2013) for data processing.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2015年1月1日至2015年12月31日的10m塔自动气象站观测数据。站点位于河北省怀来县东花园镇，下垫面为水浇地玉米。观测点的经纬度是115.7880E，40.3491N，海拔480m。
自动气象站安装在10m塔上，采集频率为30s，且10min输出一次。观测要素包括空气温度、相对湿度（5m），朝向为正北；风速（10m），风向（10m），朝向为正北；气压（安装在防水箱内）；雨量（10m）；四分量辐射（5m），朝向为正南；红外表面温度（5m），支臂朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温湿度探头埋设在气象塔正南方1.5m处，土壤温度探头埋设深度为0cm、2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm；平均土壤温度埋在地下2，4cm；土壤热流板（3块）埋设在地下6cm处。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2015-6-10 10:30。5月30日-6月5日和10月1日-10月9日由于充电控制器损坏，数据缺失。土壤热通量G1由于热流量板问题，4月19日至5月20日数据缺失。
    自动气象站发布的数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，空气温湿观测（Ta_5m，RH_5m）（℃，%），风速（Ws_10m）（m/s），风向（WD）（°），气压（Press）（hpa），降水（Rain）（mm），四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR、ULR、Rn）（W/m2），地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）（℃），土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）（W/m2）、多层土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）（%）、多层土壤温度（Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）（℃）、平均土壤温度TCAV（℃）。
站点介绍用guo et al, 2020; 数据处理用liu et al, 2013.

background: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is a key factor in surface flux estimations with remote sensing algorithms and/or land surface models. Originally, z0m is defined as the height where the wind speed, given by the extrapolation of the logarithmic wind profile, becomes zero. According to numerous observations, the variation range of z0m over different surfaces is large, from an order of 1.0 m over urban areas and mountainous areas, to an order of 0.1 mm or even 0.01 mm over smooth water body surfaces, ice and snow surfaces. The traditional way to calculate z0m is based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, using wind profile measurements. In practical applications, especially for remote sensing models and land surface models, it is difficult to obtain z0m for a local or regional scale based only on station observations. Former researchers have proposed some parameterizations between the aerodynamic roughness length and the land surface properties [e.g., vegetation height, leaf area index (LAI), etc.], since wind turbulence is controlled by the structure and spacing of roughness elements (plants and other obstacles) on the land surface, and z0m describes the roughness characteristics of a surface.
research objective: Based on the data of the Xiaotangshan Experiment (Changping District of Beijing, China), which was conducted in 2002, 2004, and 2005 respectively, the objectives of this paper are: (1) to calculate z0m over different surfaces and analyze the directional characteristics of z0m over heterogeneous surfaces using an analytical footprint model; (2) to relate the estimated z0m over heterogeneous surfaces to roughness element characteristic factors, and present a heuristic parameterization of z0m as a reference for model parameterizations.
challenges: More data is needed for further discussions.
methods: This paper calculates z0m over several land surfaces, with 3 years of experimental data from Xiaotangshan. Individual z0m over each surface component (patch) is calculated firstly with the characteristic parameters of the roughness elements (vegetation height, leaf area index, etc.), then z0m over the whole experimental field is aggregated, using the footprint weighting method.
dataset: This experiment was carried out at the Xiaotangshan Experimental Station for Precision Agriculture (40°10′41′′N, 116°26′52′′E, 35 m above sea level) in Beijing. The observation period in 2002 was from 26 March to 23 April and the land cover was bare soil. In 2004, the experiment was carried out from 30 May to 7 July. In the southern sub-plot field, the land cover was bare soil between 30 May and 11 June, while the maize plants started emerging around 12 June. In 2005, the experiment was from 1 May to 10 June and the experimental layout was almost the same as that in 2004.
findings: The results show that z0m is direction-dependent, mainly due to the heterogeneity of the size and spatial distribution of the roughness elements inside the source area along different wind directions.
backgroundCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）是利用遥感算法和/或陆面模型进行表面通量估算的关键因素。z0m最初被定义为风速通过对数风速剖面的外推在某一高度变为零的高度。根据众多观测，不同表面上z0m的变化范围很大，城市和山区的z0m约为1.0米，而平滑水体表面、冰面和雪面上的z0m则约为0.1毫米甚至0.01毫米。传统上，z0m的计算基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论，使用风速剖面测量数据。在实际应用中，尤其是对于遥感模型和陆面模型，仅依靠站点观测很难获得局部或区域尺度的z0m。以前的研究者提出了一些气动粗糙长度与陆面特性（如植被高度、叶面积指数（LAI）等）之间的参数化关系，因为风的湍流受地表粗糙元素（植物和其他障碍物）的结构和间距的控制，而z0m描述了表面的粗糙特征。
research objectiveCn: 根据2002年、2004年和2005年在中国北京昌平区进行的Xiaotangshan实验的数据，本文的目标是：(1) 计算不同表面的z0m，并使用分析足迹模型分析异质表面上z0m的方向特征；(2) 将估计的异质表面上的z0m与粗糙元素特征因子相关联，并提出z0m的启发式参数化，以作为模型参数化的参考。
challengesCn: 需要更多数据以进行进一步讨论。
methodsCn: 本文计算了多个地表的z0m，使用了来自小汤山的三年实验数据。首先，针对每个表面组成部分（斑块）计算了单独的z0m，使用了粗糙度元素的特征参数（植被高度、叶面积指数等），然后通过足迹加权方法对整个实验场的z0m进行了汇总。
datasetCn: 该实验在北京的肖塘山精准农业实验站（北纬40°10′41′′，东经116°26′52′′，海拔35米）进行。2002年的观察期为3月26日至4月23日，土地覆盖为裸土。2004年，实验时间为5月30日至7月7日。在南侧子区，土地覆盖在5月30日至6月11日期间为裸土，而玉米植物在6月12日左右开始萌芽。2005年的实验时间为5月1日至6月10日，实验布局与2004年几乎相同。
findingsCn: 结果表明，z0m是方向依赖的，主要是由于源区内粗糙元素的大小和空间分布在不同风向上的异质性。

background: 感、潜热通量作为反映地－气之间热量与水汽交换强度的重要指标，影响地－气之间的能量平衡，为不同尺度的天气系统提供物质、动力和热力来源，影响地－气之间的水循环过程。 目前传统的地表通量观测方法有许多种，如涡动相关系统（Eddy-Covariance system, EC）、波文比－能量平衡系统和空气动力学方法等。 其中，涡动相关系统是国际上公认的、最可靠的地表通量观测方法，但是观测尺度较小，其空间代表性仅有几十至几百米左右。 大孔径闪烁仪（Large Aperture Scintillometer, LAS），相对于传统的涡动相关系统，能够获得区域尺度（几百米到几公里）的平均感热通量。 由于LAS的观测尺度能较好地匹配卫星像元尺度以及数值天气预报和气候模式的网格尺度，因此，LAS的观测值能够作为遥感估算模型、数值天气预报模式和气候模式的像元／网格尺度的地面相对真值，从而对这些模型／模式进行优化和验证。 LAS的观测原理是基于莫宁－奥布霍夫相似理论（Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, MOST），结合观测得到的大气折射指数结构参数C2n和相关的气象数据，利用与温度结构参数C2T相关的稳定度普适函数fT，得到地表的区域平均感热通量。
research objective: 利用2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS相关数据，分析了LAS观测中莫宁—奥布霍夫相似理论MOST理论的适用性，并探讨了MOST理论适用性的定量判断方法。
challenges: 由于受下垫面覆盖类型、平坦程度、水热状况和天气条件等影响，实际情况很难达到理想的水平均匀假设。 目前国内的大气相似理论研究主要集中于风、温度廓线和湍流方差的相似性关系，然而有关闪烁法中的温度结构参数与湍流特征之间的相似性研究较少。
methods: 在分析LAS数据的MOST理论适用性之前，对EC和LAS数据进行初步处理。 选取2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS、EC和AWS数据。
dataset: 馆陶站（36°30′54″N，115°07′39″E）位于河北省馆陶县河寨村，其观测场及周围下垫面为农田，包括冬小麦、玉米和棉花，其中冬小麦与玉米为轮作，冬小麦生长期为10月至次年6月，玉米生长期为6－10月，棉花生长期为5－10月，属于典型的华北平原农田下垫面。 LAS源区内冬小麦（玉米）面积约占45％，棉花约占47％。 阿柔站（38°02′40″N，100°27′53″E）位于黑河上游的河谷地区，其观测场及周围下垫面为典型的高山草地，较为平坦。 源区内的植被株高在生长旺季能达到0．2～0．3m。
findings: （1）在不稳定条件下，大尺度涡旋运动、大气湍流发展状况和温度尺度都能对MOST理论适用性产生显著影响；（2）确立了两种新的MOST理论适用性判断方法，即因子分析法和温度结构参数法，并验证了这两种判断方法是合理、可靠的。

background: For surface flux measurements, large aperture scintillometer (LAS) has become more and more popular in recent years. Compared with traditional observation techniques, it can measure surface fluxes on a larger scale (500 m to 10 km). At present, LAS observation is not common in China.
research objective: The daily and monthly variation of HLAS is analyzed. And the observation differences between eddy covariance system and LAS, need to be studied further combined with footprint model and energy unbalance of eddy covariance system observation.
challenges: There is much less agreement on the form which universal stability function fT should take. Further more, since the iteration process of HLAS can not be convergence when low wind speed and very stable conditions appearing at night, Wm \ - 5 is specified.
findings: Sensible heat flux (H) calculation with the LAS data of above measurements shows that the beam height of LAS and wind speed are sensitive factors for sensible heat flux measurement (HLAS), zero-plane displacement height is crucial unless the beam height is much larger than it, and Bowen ratio needs to be determined accurately over wet surface, while air temperature, air pressure and aerodynamic roughness length are not sensitive for HLAS. According to the observations mentioned above, LAS can measure surface fluxes both over homogeneous and heterogeneous surfaces.
backgroundCn: 对于表面通量测量，大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）近年来变得越来越受欢迎。与传统观测技术相比，它可以在更大范围内（500米到10公里）测量表面通量。目前，LAS观测在中国尚不普遍。
research objectiveCn: 对HLAS的日变化和月变化进行了分析。需要进一步研究涡度协方差系统与LAS之间的观测差异，结合足迹模型和涡度协方差系统观测的能量不平衡。
challengesCn: 关于普遍稳定性函数 fT 的形式，存在很少的共识。此外，由于在低风速和夜间非常稳定的条件下，HLAS 的迭代过程无法收敛，因此指定 Wm \ - 5。
findingsCn: 利用激光雷达（LAS）数据计算显热通量（H）表明，激光雷达的光束高度和风速是显热通量测量（HLAS）的敏感因素，零平面位移高度至关重要，除非光束高度远大于它，而在湿表面上，波文比需要准确确定，而空气温度、气压和气动粗糙度长度对HLAS则不敏感。根据上述观察，激光雷达可以在均匀和非均匀表面上测量表面通量。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are eddy covariance systems considered one of the most reliable methods for surface flux measurements despite their limited spatial representativeness?
Verification.QuestionCn: 涡动协方差系统被认为是表面通量测量中最可靠的方法之一，尽管它们的空间代表性有限。

Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种数据收集方法在大面积捕捉表面通量方面更有效，涡动协方差系统还是大孔径闪烁仪？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: For accurate estimation of aerodynamic roughness length (z0m), is it more reliable to use wind profile measurements or parameterizations based on land surface properties?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 对于气动粗糙度长度（z0m）的准确估计，使用风速剖面测量更可靠，还是基于地表特性的参数化更可靠？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that utilizes an automatic weather station for capturing meteorological elements at multiple depths and heights?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的示例，该方法利用自动气象站在多个深度和高度捕获气象元素？
Example.AnswerEn: An example is the automatic weather station installed on a 10m tower at Huailai Station, which collects data every 30 seconds and outputs every 10 minutes. It includes air temperature and relative humidity at 5m, wind speed and direction at 10m, and soil temperature and moisture at multiple depths ranging from 0cm to 160cm.
Example.AnswerCn: 在怀来站安装的自动气象站位于10米高的塔上，每30秒收集一次数据，每10分钟输出一次。它包括5米处的空气温度和相对湿度、10米处的风速和风向，以及从0厘米到160厘米多个深度的土壤温度和湿度。

Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 影响Monin-Obukhov相似理论在观测数据集中适用性的具体因素有哪些？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the importance of 'aerodynamic roughness length (z0m)' in surface flux estimations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）在表面通量估计中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is a crucial factor in surface flux estimations using remote sensing algorithms or land surface models. It is defined as the height where the wind speed becomes zero, based on the extrapolation of the logarithmic wind profile. The variation range of z0m over different surfaces can be significant, affecting the accuracy of flux estimations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）是使用遥感算法或陆面模型进行表面通量估算的一个关键因素。它被定义为风速为零的高度，基于对对数风速剖面的外推。不同表面上z0m的变化范围可能很大，影响通量估算的准确性。

Definition.QuestionEn: How does the 'Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST)' apply to data collection in meteorological studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: “莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论（MOST）”如何应用于气象研究中的数据收集？
Definition.AnswerEn: The Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) is used in meteorological studies to relate observed atmospheric parameters to surface fluxes. It is applied in methods like the Eddy-Covariance system and Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS) to observe surface fluxes by utilizing stability functions and refractive index structure parameters of the atmosphere. MOST helps in determining the regional average of sensible heat flux by connecting measured data with theoretical models.
Definition.AnswerCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）在气象研究中用于将观测到的大气参数与表面通量相关联。它被应用于涡度协方差系统和大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）等方法，通过利用稳定性函数和大气的折射率结构参数来观察表面通量。MOST有助于通过将测量数据与理论模型连接起来，确定区域平均的显热通量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with the use of 'Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS)' for surface flux measurements?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用“大孔径闪烁计（LAS）”进行表面通量测量时面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: The use of Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS) for surface flux measurements presents challenges such as ensuring the applicability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory under varying conditions, like low wind speeds and stable atmospheric conditions. Additionally, factors like beam height, wind speed, and zero-plane displacement height are crucial for accurate measurements, requiring careful calibration and consideration of environmental conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）进行表面通量测量面临挑战，例如在低风速和稳定大气条件下确保Monin-Obukhov相似理论的适用性。此外，光束高度、风速和零平面位移高度等因素对准确测量至关重要，需要仔细校准和考虑环境条件。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques used in automatic meteorological stations compare with those utilized in large aperture scintillometer (LAS) methods in terms of spatial scale and data representation?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 自动气象站使用的数据收集技术与大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）方法所采用的技术在空间尺度和数据表示方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Automatic meteorological stations, as in the metadata, capture detailed point data such as air temperature, humidity, wind speed, and soil moisture at a specific location, with high temporal frequency but limited spatial representation. In contrast, LAS methods, as described in the papers, measure surface fluxes over larger spatial scales (several hundred meters to kilometers), making them more suitable for regional assessments, though they provide less localized data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 自动气象站，如元数据所示，捕获特定位置的详细点数据，如空气温度、湿度、风速和土壤湿度，具有高时间频率但空间表现有限。相比之下，文献中描述的LAS方法在更大空间尺度（几百米到几公里）上测量表面通量，更适合区域评估，尽管提供的局部数据较少。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the variability in aerodynamic roughness length across different surfaces be interpreted in relation to land surface properties and their influence on data collection methods?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同表面上气动粗糙度长度的变异性如何与地表特性相关联，并影响数据收集方法的解释。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) varies significantly across different surfaces, and this can be interpreted by considering the land surface properties such as vegetation height and leaf area index. This variability influences data collection methods by requiring parameterizations that account for the roughness elements' structure and spacing, as these factors control wind turbulence and hence affect remote sensing and land surface model estimations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）在不同表面之间变化显著，这可以通过考虑地表特性如植被高度和叶面积指数来解释。这种变异性影响数据收集方法，要求参数化考虑粗糙元素的结构和间距，因为这些因素控制风的湍流，从而影响遥感和地表模型的估计。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the implications of missing data due to instrument failure on the interpretation of meteorological trends within datasets, and how might researchers address these gaps?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 仪器故障导致的数据缺失对气象趋势在数据集中的解释有何影响，研究人员如何应对这些空白？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Missing data due to instrument failure can hinder the interpretation of meteorological trends by introducing gaps in continuous observations, which are critical for accurate analysis. Researchers can address these gaps by using data quality control measures, such as marking missing data with specific codes, and employing statistical techniques to estimate or interpolate missing values based on available data patterns and adjacent observations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 由于仪器故障导致的数据缺失可能会妨碍气象趋势的解释，因为连续观测中的缺口对准确分析至关重要。研究人员可以通过使用数据质量控制措施来解决这些缺口，例如用特定代码标记缺失数据，并采用统计技术根据可用数据模式和相邻观测值来估计或插补缺失值。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What factors should be considered when integrating large aperture scintillometer data with other meteorological datasets to enhance the understanding of surface fluxes over heterogeneous landscapes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在将大孔径闪烁仪数据与其他气象数据集整合时，应考虑以下因素，以增强对异质景观表面通量的理解：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: When integrating large aperture scintillometer data with other meteorological datasets, factors such as beam height, wind speed, and zero-plane displacement height should be considered, as they significantly affect the measurement of sensible heat flux. Additionally, understanding the heterogeneity of the landscape and ensuring compatibility with the footprint model and energy balance considerations are crucial for accurately interpreting surface fluxes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在将大孔径闪烁仪数据与其他气象数据集整合时，必须考虑诸如光束高度、风速和零平面位移高度等因素，因为这些因素会显著影响显热通量的测量。此外，理解地表的异质性并确保与足迹模型和能量平衡考虑的兼容性，对于准确解释表面通量至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors cause challenges in collecting accurate surface flux data using remote sensing algorithms and land surface models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致使用遥感算法和陆面模型收集准确表面通量数据的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting accurate surface flux data arise due to the difficulty in obtaining aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) for local or regional scales from station observations. The variation of z0m across different surfaces, from urban areas to smooth water bodies, adds complexity. The parameterization of z0m concerning land surface properties like vegetation height and leaf area index influences the accuracy of surface flux estimations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 收集准确的表面通量数据面临挑战，主要是由于从站点观测中获取局部或区域尺度的气动粗糙度长度（z0m）的困难。z0m在不同表面之间的变化，从城市区域到光滑水体，增加了复杂性。z0m与土地表面特性（如植被高度和叶面积指数）的参数化影响了表面通量估计的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for further data collection to improve the understanding of directional dependencies in aerodynamic roughness length (z0m)?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致需要进一步数据收集以改善对气动粗糙长度（z0m）方向依赖性的理解的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for further data collection arises from the direction-dependent nature of z0m, influenced by the heterogeneity of roughness elements such as size and spatial distribution within the source area along different wind directions. This complexity necessitates more data to explore and parameterize these dependencies accurately for model applications.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 进一步数据收集的需求源于z0m的方向依赖性，这种依赖性受到源区域内粗糙元素（如大小和空间分布）在不同风向下的异质性影响。这种复杂性需要更多的数据来准确探索和参数化这些依赖关系，以便用于模型应用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using automatic weather stations with high-frequency data collection on the accuracy and granularity of meteorological datasets in agricultural regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用自动气象站进行高频数据收集对农业地区气象数据集的准确性和细致程度可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using automatic weather stations with high-frequency data collection, such as those collecting data every 30 seconds and outputting every 10 minutes, enhances the accuracy and granularity of meteorological datasets. This allows for detailed monitoring of variables like air temperature, relative humidity, wind speed, and more, which are crucial for understanding microclimatic variations and their impacts on agricultural areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用自动气象站进行高频数据收集，例如每30秒收集一次数据并每10分钟输出一次，增强了气象数据集的准确性和细致性。这使得对空气温度、相对湿度、风速等变量的详细监测成为可能，这些变量对于理解微气候变化及其对农业地区的影响至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to analyze the directional characteristics and parameterizations of aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) over heterogeneous surfaces using experimental data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 分析异质表面上气动粗糙长度（z0m）的方向特征和参数化的重要性在于利用实验数据。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Analyzing the directional characteristics and parameterizations of z0m is important for improving the accuracy of remote sensing algorithms and land surface models. Understanding how z0m varies with land surface properties such as vegetation height and distribution helps in better representing surface roughness in models, which is critical for accurate predictions of wind profiles and surface energy exchanges.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 分析z0m的方向特性和参数化对于提高遥感算法和陆面模型的准确性至关重要。了解z0m如何随地表特性（如植被高度和分布）变化，有助于更好地在模型中表示表面粗糙度，这对于准确预测风剖面和表面能量交换至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are aerodynamic roughness length values (z0m) calculated and parameterized using observational data from multiple land surface types?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何使用来自多种地表类型的观测数据计算和参数化气动粗糙度长度值（z0m）？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length values (z0m) are calculated by first determining z0m over each surface component (patch) using characteristic parameters of roughness elements like vegetation height and leaf area index. Then, z0m over the entire experimental field is aggregated using the footprint weighting method to account for directional characteristics and heterogeneity.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度值（z0m）是通过首先根据粗糙元素的特征参数（如植被高度和叶面积指数）计算每个表面组件（斑块）上的z0m。然后，使用足迹加权方法对整个实验场地的z0m进行汇总，以考虑方向特征和异质性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches are used to assess the applicability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory for large aperture scintillometer data in different environmental conditions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于评估Monin-Obukhov相似理论在不同环境条件下对大孔径闪烁仪数据适用性的研究方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory applicability is assessed by analyzing LAS data alongside EC and AWS data, focusing on factors like large-scale eddy movements, atmospheric turbulence development, and temperature scales under unstable conditions. Two new methods—factor analysis and temperature structure parameter method—are established for quantitatively judging the theory's applicability, ensuring their reliability through validation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 通过分析激光雷达（LAS）数据与涡度相关（EC）和自动气象站（AWS）数据，评估了Monin-Obukhov相似理论的适用性，重点关注大规模涡动、气氛湍流发展和不稳定条件下的温度尺度等因素。建立了两种新方法——因子分析法和温度结构参数法，用于定量判断该理论的适用性，并通过验证确保其可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies allow the integration of aerodynamic roughness length estimations into remote sensing algorithms and land surface models at regional scales?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论可以将气动粗糙长度估计集成到区域尺度的遥感算法和陆面模型中？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration is enabled through parameterizations between aerodynamic roughness length and land surface properties such as vegetation height and leaf area index, as wind turbulence is influenced by the structure and arrangement of roughness elements on the land surface.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过气动粗糙长度与土地表面特性（如植被高度和叶面积指数）之间的参数化，启用了这种集成，因为风的湍流受到土地表面粗糙元素的结构和排列的影响。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of large aperture scintillometers (LAS) facilitate the measurement of surface fluxes over larger areas compared to traditional methods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪（LAS）的使用如何促进了对较大区域表面通量的测量，相较于传统方法。
Enablement.AnswerEn: LAS can measure surface fluxes over larger scales (500m to 10km) by providing regional average sensible heat flux values that match satellite pixel scales and numerical weather prediction grid scales, thus serving as ground truth for optimizing and validating remote sensing models and climate models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 激光雷达（LAS）可以在更大尺度（500米到10公里）上测量表面通量，通过提供与卫星像素尺度和数值天气预报网格尺度相匹配的区域平均显热通量值，从而作为优化和验证遥感模型及气候模型的地面真值。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods for surface flux measurements be challenging when using traditional techniques like the eddy covariance system compared to large aperture scintillometers?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用传统技术如涡动协方差系统进行表面通量测量的数据收集方法可能面临挑战，而大型孔径闪烁仪则相对较为简单，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The eddy covariance system, while reliable, has a small observational scale with spatial representativeness of only tens to hundreds of meters. In contrast, large aperture scintillometers can capture regional scale fluxes over hundreds of meters to kilometers, making them more suitable for matching satellite pixel scales and model grid scales. Additionally, the eddy covariance system can face energy balance issues and requires a thorough understanding of footprint models to interpret data accurately over heterogeneous surfaces.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统虽然可靠，但其观测尺度较小，空间代表性仅为几十到几百米。相比之下，大孔径闪烁仪能够捕捉数百米到数公里的区域尺度通量，使其更适合与卫星像素尺度和模型网格尺度相匹配。此外，涡度协方差系统可能面临能量平衡问题，并且需要对足迹模型有深入理解，以便在异质表面上准确解读数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a dataset focusing on aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) require additional data for comprehensive analysis?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么一个专注于气动粗糙度长度（z0m）的数据集可能需要额外的数据以进行全面分析？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is highly variable across different surfaces due to the heterogeneity in size and distribution of roughness elements, such as vegetation height and leaf area index. This variability makes it challenging to obtain accurate z0m measurements for local or regional scales based solely on station observations. More data is necessary to accurately parameterize z0m and relate it to surface characteristics, aiding in model parameterizations for remote sensing and land surface models.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）因粗糙元素的大小和分布（如植被高度和叶面积指数）的异质性而在不同表面上高度可变。这种变异性使得仅依靠站点观测来获得准确的z0m测量值在地方或区域尺度上变得具有挑战性。需要更多的数据来准确参数化z0m，并将其与表面特征相关联，从而有助于遥感和地表模型的参数化。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) not always applicable for analyzing data from large aperture scintillometers?
Expectation.QuestionCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）并不总是适用于分析来自大孔径闪烁仪的数据，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The applicability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) is influenced by factors such as surface cover type, flatness, hydrometeorological conditions, and weather. These factors impact the assumption of horizontal homogeneity needed for MOST. Large eddies, atmospheric turbulence, and temperature scales also significantly affect MOST's applicability under unstable conditions. Therefore, new methods for determining MOST applicability, such as factor analysis and temperature structure parameter methods, are necessary to ensure reliable analysis.
Expectation.AnswerCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）的适用性受到表面覆盖类型、地形平坦度、水文气象条件和天气等因素的影响。这些因素影响了MOST所需的水平均匀性假设。大涡、气候湍流和温度尺度在不稳定条件下也显著影响MOST的适用性。因此，确定MOST适用性的新方法，如因子分析和温度结构参数方法，是必要的，以确保分析的可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How can the integration of different data collection techniques enhance the reliability of surface flux estimations over various land surfaces?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 不同数据收集技术的整合如何增强对各种陆地表面表面通量估算的可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integration of different data collection techniques, such as combining eddy covariance systems with large aperture scintillometers, can enhance reliability by providing complementary observations that cover different spatial scales. This approach allows for a more comprehensive analysis of surface fluxes, addressing the limitations of each method individually and enabling cross-validation and optimization of remote sensing and land surface models.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 不同数据收集技术的整合，例如将涡度协方差系统与大孔径闪烁仪结合，可以通过提供覆盖不同空间尺度的互补观测来增强可靠性。这种方法允许对表面通量进行更全面的分析，解决各个方法单独存在的局限性，并实现遥感和陆面模型的交叉验证和优化。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze different data collection methods for measuring aerodynamic roughness length and discuss their applicability over various surfaces.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析不同的数据收集方法，以测量气动粗糙度长度，并讨论它们在各种表面上的适用性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is traditionally calculated using wind profile measurements based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory. However, for remote sensing models and land surface models, obtaining z0m for local or regional scales based solely on station observations is challenging. A possible method is using parameterizations between aerodynamic roughness length and land surface properties, such as vegetation height and leaf area index, which describe the roughness characteristics of a surface.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）通常是基于风剖面测量通过莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论计算的。然而，对于遥感模型和陆面模型，仅仅依靠站点观测来获取局部或区域尺度的z0m是具有挑战性的。一种可能的方法是使用气动粗糙长度与地表特性之间的参数化关系，例如植被高度和叶面积指数，这些特性描述了表面的粗糙特征。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore data processing and quality control measures necessary for ensuring reliable meteorological and surface flux data collection.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨确保气象和表面通量数据收集可靠所需的数据处理和质量控制措施。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control measures include ensuring the completeness of data by checking for 144 data points per day (every 10 minutes), marking missing data with -6999, and removing duplicate records. Additionally, data that is physically meaningless or beyond instrument range is deleted, and a consistent date and time format is maintained. Specific data loss periods are noted, such as during equipment malfunctions or maintenance.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制措施包括通过检查每天144个数据点（每10分钟一次）来确保数据的完整性，用-6999标记缺失数据，并删除重复记录。此外，物理上无意义或超出仪器范围的数据会被删除，并保持一致的日期和时间格式。特定的数据丢失期间会被记录，例如在设备故障或维护期间。
